cause.description:
Partners in Health serves in poor countries and does whatever it takes to improve access to primary healthcare. In finding a way to provide care with scarce resources in rural developing countries, Partners in Health has developed an innovative model of care based on teaching communities to support patients at home. We believe that Partners in Health is demonstrating a better model of care that the whole world can learn from, and we will help them expand their efforts, starting in Rwanda.
Learn more about Partners in Health: http://www.pih.org/home.html
See Bill Clinton talk about his 2007 TEDPrize Wish and what the Clinton Foundation is doing to help Partners in Health expand its program in Rwanda as a beacon of hope and model for rural developing countries: http://www.ted.com/index.php/speakers/view/id/82
To join our group, search for "Friends of Partners in Health" under Groups. It is open to all, and we would love to have you engaged in the discussion. http://facebook.com/group.php?gid=2399528731
1. Partners in Health is showing the world a better model of care and it should be supported.
cause.mission: Raise money to enable Partners in Health to expand its program in Rwanda as a model for the world
cause.name: Friends of Partners in Health in Rwanda
